These are the sons<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>; Reuben<S>7205</S>, Simeon<S>8095</S>, Levi<S>3878</S>, and Judah<S>3063</S>, Issachar<S>3485</S>, and Zebulun<S>2074</S>, <sup>Israel: or, Jacob</sup>
Dan<S>1835</S>, Joseph<S>3130</S>, and Benjamin<S>1144</S>, Naphtali<S>5321</S>, Gad<S>1410</S>, and Asher<S>836</S>.
The sons<S>1121</S> of Judah<S>3063</S>; Er<S>6147</S>, and Onan<S>209</S>, and Shelah<S>7956</S>: which three<S>7969</S> were born<S>3205</S> unto him of the daughter<S>1323</S> of Shua<S>7774</S> <S>1340</S> the Canaanitess<S>3669</S>. And Er<S>6147</S>, the firstborn<S>1060</S> of Judah<S>3063</S>, was evil<S>7451</S> in the sight<S>5869</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>; and he slew<S>4191</S> him.
And Tamar<S>8559</S> his daughter in law<S>3618</S> bare<S>3205</S> him Pharez<S>6557</S> and Zerah<S>2226</S>. All the sons<S>1121</S> of Judah<S>3063</S> were five<S>2568</S>.
The sons<S>1121</S> of Pharez<S>6557</S>; Hezron<S>2696</S>, and Hamul<S>2538</S>.
And the sons<S>1121</S> of Zerah<S>2226</S>; Zimri<S>2174</S>, and Ethan<S>387</S>, and Heman<S>1968</S>, and Calcol<S>3633</S>, and Dara<S>1873</S>: five<S>2568</S> of them in all. <sup>Zimri: or, Zabdi</sup> <sup>Dara: or, Darda</sup>
And the sons<S>1121</S> of Carmi<S>3756</S>; Achar<S>5917</S>, the troubler<S>5916</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, who transgressed<S>4603</S> in the thing accursed<S>2764</S>. <sup>Achar: or, Achan</sup>
And the sons<S>1121</S> of Ethan<S>387</S>; Azariah<S>5838</S>.
The sons<S>1121</S> also of Hezron<S>2696</S>, that were born<S>3205</S> unto him; Jerahmeel<S>3396</S>, and Ram<S>7410</S>, and Chelubai<S>3621</S>. <sup>Ram: Gr. Aram</sup> <sup>Chelubai: or, Caleb</sup>
And Ram<S>7410</S> begat<S>3205</S> Amminadab<S>5992</S>; and Amminadab<S>5992</S> begat<S>3205</S> Nahshon<S>5177</S>, prince<S>5387</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Judah<S>3063</S>;
And Nahshon<S>5177</S> begat<S>3205</S> Salma<S>8007</S>, and Salma<S>8007</S> begat<S>3205</S> Boaz<S>1162</S>,
And Boaz<S>1162</S> begat<S>3205</S> Obed<S>5744</S>, and Obed<S>5744</S> begat<S>3205</S> Jesse<S>3448</S>,
And Jesse<S>3448</S> begat<S>3205</S> his firstborn<S>1060</S> Eliab<S>446</S>, and Abinadab<S>41</S> the second<S>8145</S>, and Shimma<S>8092</S> the third<S>7992</S>, <sup>Shimma: or, Shammah</sup>
Nethaneel<S>5417</S> the fourth<S>7243</S>, Raddai<S>7288</S> the fifth<S>2549</S>,
Ozem<S>684</S> the sixth<S>8345</S>, David<S>1732</S> the seventh<S>7637</S>:
Whose sisters<S>269</S> were Zeruiah<S>6870</S>, and Abigail<S>26</S>. And the sons<S>1121</S> of Zeruiah<S>6870</S>; Abishai<S>52</S>, and Joab<S>3097</S>, and Asahel<S>6214</S>, three<S>7969</S>.
And Abigail<S>26</S> bare<S>3205</S> Amasa<S>6021</S>: and the father<S>1</S> of Amasa<S>6021</S> was Jether<S>3500</S> the Ishmeelite<S>3459</S>.
And Caleb<S>3612</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Hezron<S>2696</S> begat<S>3205</S> children of<S>854</S> Azubah<S>5806</S> his wife<S>802</S>, and of Jerioth<S>3408</S>: her sons<S>1121</S> are these; Jesher<S>3475</S>, and Shobab<S>7727</S>, and Ardon<S>715</S>.
And when Azubah<S>5806</S> was dead<S>4191</S>, Caleb<S>3612</S> took<S>3947</S> unto him Ephrath<S>672</S>, which bare<S>3205</S> him Hur<S>2354</S>.
And Hur<S>2354</S> begat<S>3205</S> Uri<S>221</S>, and Uri<S>221</S> begat<S>3205</S> Bezaleel<S>1212</S>.
And afterward<S>310</S> Hezron<S>2696</S> went in<S>935</S> to the daughter<S>1323</S> of Machir<S>4353</S> the father<S>1</S> of Gilead<S>1568</S>, whom he married<S>3947</S> when he was threescore<S>8346</S> years<S>8141</S> old<S>1121</S>; and she bare<S>3205</S> him Segub<S>7687</S>. <sup>married: Heb. took</sup>
And Segub<S>7687</S> begat<S>3205</S> Jair<S>2971</S>, who had three<S>7969</S> and twenty<S>6242</S> cities<S>5892</S> in the land<S>776</S> of Gilead<S>1568</S>.
And he took<S>3947</S> Geshur<S>1650</S>, and Aram<S>758</S>, with the towns<S>2333</S> of Jair<S>2971</S>, from them, with Kenath<S>7079</S>, and the towns<S>1323</S> thereof, even threescore<S>8346</S> cities<S>5892</S>. All these belonged to the sons<S>1121</S> of Machir<S>4353</S> the father<S>1</S> of Gilead<S>1568</S>.
And after<S>310</S> that Hezron<S>2696</S> was dead<S>4194</S> in Calebephratah<S>3613</S>, then Abiah<S>29</S> Hezron's<S>2696</S> wife<S>802</S> bare<S>3205</S> him Ashur<S>806</S> the father<S>1</S> of Tekoa<S>8620</S>.
And the sons<S>1121</S> of Jerahmeel<S>3396</S> the firstborn<S>1060</S> of Hezron<S>2696</S> were, Ram<S>7410</S> the firstborn<S>1060</S>, and Bunah<S>946</S>, and Oren<S>767</S>, and Ozem<S>684</S>, and Ahijah<S>281</S>.
Jerahmeel<S>3396</S> had also another<S>312</S> wife<S>802</S>, whose name<S>8034</S> was Atarah<S>5851</S>; she was the mother<S>517</S> of Onam<S>208</S>.
And the sons<S>1121</S> of Ram<S>7410</S> the firstborn<S>1060</S> of Jerahmeel<S>3396</S> were, Maaz<S>4619</S>, and Jamin<S>3226</S>, and Eker<S>6134</S>.
And the sons<S>1121</S> of Onam<S>208</S> were, Shammai<S>8060</S>, and Jada<S>3047</S>. And the sons<S>1121</S> of Shammai<S>8060</S>; Nadab<S>5070</S>, and Abishur<S>51</S>.
And the name<S>8034</S> of the wife<S>802</S> of Abishur<S>51</S> was Abihail<S>32</S>, and she bare<S>3205</S> him Ahban<S>257</S>, and Molid<S>4140</S>.
And the sons<S>1121</S> of Nadab<S>5070</S>; Seled<S>5540</S>, and Appaim<S>649</S>: but Seled<S>5540</S> died<S>4191</S> without children<S>1121</S>.
And the sons<S>1121</S> of Appaim<S>649</S>; Ishi<S>3469</S>. And the sons<S>1121</S> of Ishi<S>3469</S>; Sheshan<S>8348</S>. And the children<S>1121</S> of Sheshan<S>8348</S>; Ahlai<S>304</S>.
And the sons<S>1121</S> of Jada<S>3047</S> the brother<S>251</S> of Shammai<S>8060</S>; Jether<S>3500</S>, and Jonathan<S>3129</S>: and Jether<S>3500</S> died<S>4191</S> without children<S>1121</S>.
And the sons<S>1121</S> of Jonathan<S>3129</S>; Peleth<S>6431</S>, and Zaza<S>2117</S>. These were the sons<S>1121</S> of Jerahmeel<S>3396</S>.
Now Sheshan<S>8348</S> had no sons<S>1121</S>, but daughters<S>1323</S>. And Sheshan<S>8348</S> had a servant<S>5650</S>, an Egyptian<S>4713</S>, whose name<S>8034</S> was Jarha<S>3398</S>.
And Sheshan<S>8348</S> gave<S>5414</S> his daughter<S>1323</S> to Jarha<S>3398</S> his servant<S>5650</S> to wife<S>802</S>; and she bare<S>3205</S> him Attai<S>6262</S>.
And Attai<S>6262</S> begat<S>3205</S> Nathan<S>5416</S>, and Nathan<S>5416</S> begat<S>3205</S> Zabad<S>2066</S>,
And Zabad<S>2066</S> begat<S>3205</S> Ephlal<S>654</S>, and Ephlal<S>654</S> begat<S>3205</S> Obed<S>5744</S>,
And Obed<S>5744</S> begat<S>3205</S> Jehu<S>3058</S>, and Jehu<S>3058</S> begat<S>3205</S> Azariah<S>5838</S>,
And Azariah<S>5838</S> begat<S>3205</S> Helez<S>2503</S>, and Helez<S>2503</S> begat<S>3205</S> Eleasah<S>501</S>,
And Eleasah<S>501</S> begat<S>3205</S> Sisamai<S>5581</S>, and Sisamai<S>5581</S> begat<S>3205</S> Shallum<S>7967</S>,
And Shallum<S>7967</S> begat<S>3205</S> Jekamiah<S>3359</S>, and Jekamiah<S>3359</S> begat<S>3205</S> Elishama<S>476</S>.
Now the sons<S>1121</S> of Caleb<S>3612</S> the brother<S>251</S> of Jerahmeel<S>3396</S> were, Mesha<S>4337</S> his firstborn<S>1060</S>, which was the father<S>1</S> of Ziph<S>2128</S>; and the sons<S>1121</S> of Mareshah<S>4762</S> the father<S>1</S> of Hebron<S>2275</S>.
And the sons<S>1121</S> of Hebron<S>2275</S>; Korah<S>7141</S>, and Tappuah<S>8599</S>, and Rekem<S>7552</S>, and Shema<S>8087</S>.
And Shema<S>8087</S> begat<S>3205</S> Raham<S>7357</S>, the father<S>1</S> of Jorkoam<S>3421</S>: and Rekem<S>7552</S> begat<S>3205</S> Shammai<S>8060</S>.
And the son<S>1121</S> of Shammai<S>8060</S> was Maon<S>4584</S>: and Maon<S>4584</S> was the father<S>1</S> of Bethzur<S>1049</S>.
And Ephah<S>5891</S>, Caleb's<S>3612</S> concubine<S>6370</S>, bare<S>3205</S> Haran<S>2771</S>, and Moza<S>4162</S>, and Gazez<S>1495</S>: and Haran<S>2771</S> begat<S>3205</S> Gazez<S>1495</S>.
And the sons<S>1121</S> of Jahdai<S>3056</S>; Regem<S>7276</S>, and Jotham<S>3147</S>, and Geshan<S>1529</S>, and Pelet<S>6404</S>, and Ephah<S>5891</S>, and Shaaph<S>8174</S>.
Maachah<S>4601</S>, Caleb's<S>3612</S> concubine<S>6370</S>, bare<S>3205</S> Sheber<S>7669</S>, and Tirhanah<S>8647</S>.
She bare<S>3205</S> also Shaaph<S>8174</S> the father<S>1</S> of Madmannah<S>4089</S>, Sheva<S>7724</S> the father<S>1</S> of Machbenah<S>4343</S>, and the father<S>1</S> of Gibea<S>1388</S>: and the daughter<S>1323</S> of Caleb<S>3612</S> was Achsah<S>5915</S>.
These were the sons<S>1121</S> of Caleb<S>3612</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Hur<S>2354</S>, the firstborn<S>1060</S> of Ephratah<S>672</S>; Shobal<S>7732</S> the father<S>1</S> of Kirjathjearim<S>7157</S>,
Salma<S>8007</S> the father<S>1</S> of Bethlehem<S>1035</S>, Hareph<S>2780</S> the father<S>1</S> of Bethgader<S>1013</S>.
And Shobal<S>7732</S> the father<S>1</S> of Kirjathjearim<S>7157</S> had sons<S>1121</S>; Haroeh<S>7204</S>, and half<S>2677</S> of the Manahethites<S>2679</S>. <sup>Haroeh: or, Reaiah</sup> <sup>half: or, half of the Menuchites, or, Hatsihammenuchoth</sup>
And the families<S>4940</S> of Kirjathjearim<S>7157</S>; the Ithrites<S>3505</S>, and the Puhites<S>6336</S>, and the Shumathites<S>8126</S>, and the Mishraites<S>4954</S>; of them came<S>3318</S> the Zareathites<S>6882</S>, and the Eshtaulites<S>848</S>.
The sons<S>1121</S> of Salma<S>8007</S>; Bethlehem<S>1035</S>, and the Netophathites<S>5200</S>, Ataroth<S>5852</S>, the house of Joab<S>5854</S>, and half<S>2677</S> of the Manahethites<S>2680</S>, the Zorites<S>6882</S>. <sup>Ataroth: or, Atarites, or, crowns of the house of Joab</sup>
And the families<S>4940</S> of the scribes<S>5608</S> which dwelt<S>3427</S> <S>3427</S> at Jabez<S>3258</S>; the Tirathites<S>8654</S>, the Shimeathites<S>8101</S>, and Suchathites<S>7756</S>. These<S>1992</S> are the Kenites<S>7017</S> that came<S>935</S> of Hemath<S>2574</S>, the father<S>1</S> of the house<S>1004</S> of Rechab<S>7394</S>.
